basic.description:
Offers a basic level of Spanish understanding, speaking, reading and writing for students who have no knowledge of Spanish whatsoever.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Beginning Spanish I

extra.enrollment_requirement: One-Way Exclusion    May not be taken with or after SPAN101; SPAN112; SPAN201; SPAN204; SPAN205; SPAN301; SPAN302; SPAN303;SPAN304; SPAN401; SPAN402.
